Package instatistics.service

Class InstatisticsServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
instatistics.service.InstatisticsServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
InstatisticsService
@Service public class InstatisticsServiceImpl extends Object implements InstatisticsService
Classe che descrive i servizi dell'API. Estende l'interfaccia Service.
Author:
Micheli Elisa, Mattioli Sara
